body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}


In this conversation, the agent's name is Jose Foster and the customer's name is Marilyn Hayes.  The conversation is about Phat Hogs (a Motorcycle Dealership ) and is a conversation about typical situation.The customer is feeling {emotion}.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello! Thank you for calling Phat Hogs Motorcycle Dealership. My name is Jose Foster. How may I assist you today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Hi, this is Marilyn Hayes. I'm just looking for some information on your motorcycles.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: It's great to meet you, Marilyn! I would be happy to help you with that. Can I start by asking how long you've been interested in motorcycles?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: I've been interested for a few years now, but I'm still a bit unsure about what to choose.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: That's completely understandable! We have a wide variety of options available. Just out of curiosity, could you share your zip code with me?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure, it's seven zero two four two.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you, Marilyn! That helps a lot. Could you also provide me with your email address to send you some options?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Perfect! I’ll send you the details right away. We have some fantastic offers this month that I think you’ll love.

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Thank you, Jose! I appreciate your help.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: You're welcome, Marilyn! Thank you for your time today. If you have any more questions, feel free to reach out. Have a great day!
